name: Behaviour Genetics
description: State of the art techniques used in the genetic, molecular, statistical and neurobiological analysis of behaviour are discussed. We focus on behaviour-genetic analysis of olfaction, foraging, rhythms and sex in three model systems (the wormÿC. elegans, the fruit flyÿD. melanogasterÿand the mouse). We discuss how information from these model organisms can be used to shed light on behaviour genetics of non-model organisms including humans. [24L]
